dcterms:creator: L. Del Pero
S. Ricco
R. Sukthankar
V. Ferrari
dcterms:description: The TigDog dataset consists of short videos of 3 animal species: tigers, horses, and dogs, sourced from nature documentaries. Each video contains at least one instance of the class to which it belongs, and the videos are annotated according to the kind of motion the animal is performing, such as walk, run, or turn head. However, the authors ignore these annotations in their study.
dcterms:title: TigDog Dataset

dcterms:creator: C. C. L. D. L. Kai Chen
Hang Song
dcterms:description: The WLD (WildLife Documentary) dataset consists of videos of several species, including tigers, koalas, langurs, and ostriches, sourced from 15 documentary films on YouTube. The videos range from 9 minutes to 50 minutes in duration and have resolutions from 360p to 1080p. Each animal is annotated, resulting in about 4098 short videos consisting of 60 different animal species, although the authors disregard the subtitles in their study.
dcterms:title: WLD (WildLife Documentary) Dataset
